content: booties are worked from the sole upward the bonnet crown is worked in the round and then the remainder is worked flat **finished measurements ** bonnet circumference 16 3/4 booties length 3 3/4 **gauge ** 10 single_crochet x 10 row = 4 save time check your gauge **materials ** premier® yarns minikins™ chenille 100% polyester 1 76oz/50g 54yds/50m 2174-10 raindrops on roses - 3 balls **hooks & notions ** us size k-10 5 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle removable stitch marker
